hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CAST(fam.familia AS int) familia, CAST(s.sublinea AS int) sublinea, CAST(l.linea AS int) linea, CAST(f.cliente AS int) cliente, dfc.precio_pactado * dfc.cantidad total, CAST(c.agente AS int) agente_cliente FROM Facturas_Clientes f INNER JOIN Detalles_Facturas_Clientes dfc ON dfc.factura = f.factura INNER JOIN Articulos a ON a.articulo = dfc.articulo INNER JOIN familias_articulos fam ON fam.familia = a.familia INNER JOIN sublineas_articulos s ON s.sublinea = fam.sublinea INNER JOIN lineas_articulos l ON l.linea = s.linea WHERE f.sucursal = 1 AND f.estado_actual != 'Cancelada' AND f.fecha_factura >= :MinDate AND f.fecha_factura < dateadd(day, 1, :MaxDate) ORDER BY c.agente ASC, CAST(c.cliente AS int) ASC, f.factura ASC
